metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1564 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in style-underground/search in Plain Black WebGUI 7.10.29 and earlier allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the Search field.

criterions.comment: webgui: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
